description: One Sabre to rule them all! The best lightsaber app on webOS, and it is FREE! Choose from 5 colors and 4 different hilts (handles, for those who aren't Jedis). Share the app with your friends so you can have lightsaber battles - or slay iPhone fanboys! ***** Most recent update includes: minor fixes, updated splash screen, update checking, and a visual flash when you land a strike. ***** Keep updated with JDF Software titles by following me on twitter http://twitter.com/jdfsoftware ***** For support and suggestions, please visit http://bit.ly/jdfsoftware-forum or e-mail jdfsoftware@gmail.com
